title: Floral Emerald Diamond Haaram Set with Jhumka
features: Floral-inspired design with intricate filigree work. The Haaram features graduated floral motifs, each meticulously set with emeralds, rubies, and sparkling diamonds. The earrings are matching, showcasing a classic jhumka silhouette with a pearl drop. The necklace has a delicate mesh chain. The overall design evokes the rich heritage of South Indian temple jewelry.
description: This exquisite Haaram set is a stunning testament to traditional South Indian craftsmanship. The floral design is timeless and elegant, while the combination of emeralds, rubies, and diamonds exudes luxury. Each stone is carefully selected for its quality and brilliance. The matching jhumkas complete the look, making this set perfect for any special occasion. A true heirloom piece to be cherished for generations.
